extension-point.name: Flag to use basedir as resource directory

param.name: args.gen.task.lbl
param.desc: Specifies whether to generate headings for sections within task topics.

param.name: args.rellinks
param.desc: Specifies which links to include in the output.

val.desc: Parent, child, next, and previous links are not included.

param.name: args.debug
param.desc: Specifies whether debugging information is included in the log.

param.name: args.draft
param.desc: Specifies whether the content of <draft-comment> and <required-cleanup> elements is included in the output.

param.name: args.figurelink.style
param.desc: Specifies how cross references to figures are styled in output.

param.name: args.filter
param.desc: Specifies a filter file to be used to include, exclude, or flag content.

param.name: args.grammar.cache
param.desc: Specifies whether the grammar-caching feature of the XML parser is used.

param.name: args.input
param.desc: Specifies the master file for your documentation project.

param.name: args.input.dir
param.desc: Specifies the base directory for your documentation project.

param.name: args.logdir
param.desc: Specifies the location where DITA-OT places log files for your project.

param.name: args.output.base
param.desc: Specifies the name of the output file without file extension.

param.name: args.tablelink.style
param.desc: Specifies how cross references to tables are styled.

param.name: link-crawl
param.desc: Specifies whether to crawl only those topic links found in maps, or all discovered topic links.

param.name: clean.temp
param.desc: Specifies whether DITA-OT deletes the files in the temporary directory after it finishes a build.

param.name: dita.dir
param.desc: Specifies where DITA-OT is installed.

param.name: dita.temp.dir
param.desc: Specifies the location of the temporary directory.

param.name: dita.input.valfile
param.desc: Specifies a filter file to be used to include, exclude, or flag content.

param.name: filter-stage
param.desc: Specifies whether filtering is done before all other processing, or after key and conref processing.

param.name: force-unique
param.desc: Generate copy-to attributes to duplicate topicref elements.

param.name: generate.copy.outer
param.desc: Specifies whether to generate output files for content that is not located in or beneath the directory containing the DITA map file.

val.desc: Do not generate output for content that is located outside the DITA map directory.
Shift the output directory so that it contains all output for the publication.

param.name: onlytopic.in.map
param.desc: Specifies whether files that are linked to, or referenced with a @conref attribute, generate output.

param.name: outer.control
param.desc: Specifies how DITA-OT handles content files that are not located in or below the directory containing the master DITA map.

val.desc: Fail quickly if files are going to be generated or copied outside of the directory.
Complete the operation if files will be generated or copied outside of the directory, but log a warning.
Quietly finish without generating warnings or errors.

param.name: output.dir
param.desc: Specifies the name and location of the output directory.

param.name: root-chunk-override
param.desc: Override for map chunk attribute value.

param.name: transtype
param.desc: Specifies the output format (transformation type).

param.name: validate
param.desc: Specifies whether DITA-OT validates the content.

param.name: generate-debug-attributes
param.desc: Specifies whether the @xtrf and @xtrc debugging attributes are generated in the temporary files.

param.name: processing-mode
param.desc: Specifies how DITA-OT handles errors and error recovery.

val.desc: When an error is encountered, DITA-OT stops processing
When an error is encountered, DITA-OT attempts to recover from it
When an error is encountered, DITA-OT continues processing but does not attempt error recovery

param.name: conserve-memory
param.desc: Conserve memory at the expense of processing speed

param.name: default.language
param.desc: Specifies the default language for source documents.

param.name: remove-broken-links
param.desc: Remove broken related links.
